ModMetaData.name: Hair'n'Beards Optimized Pack
ModMetaData.author: Cyr
ModMetaData.description:
Aggregates Hairs from various mods, with texture size changes when needed to keep balance between optimization and good look. Includes :
- Roo's HD Dreadlocks (downscaled to 256px) - Erin's Baldur's Gate 3 (downscaled to 256px) - Botch's Hardtimes (untouched because his 512px texture are highly optimized) - ЯEБAЛ's Absolute Legends Hairs (downscaled to 256px) -> Keep original?
In plans :
- Von's Hair Women (upscale to 256px) - Storyteller's Hairs (upscale to 256px) - VE Highmate Beautiful Haired Retexture - Some Selected from RH2
